channel.title: Help plz
channel.description:
how to i add veng to the ancient spell book
edit: also how to fix dfs, i can weild it but it just stays the way it is, wen i walk it dont move, same wen i fite

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“faze1one, post:5, topic:352117”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=448470.msg3290954#msg3290954 date=1280564936]
well with the dfs, the problem is caused because the model has no animation data, get the dfs model from a 474 model dump and just throw it in your client and your dfs should be animated.
[/quote]

any suggestion?[/quote]

… i just told you what to do, get a 474 model dump, find he dfs model, gzip it and add it to your client…

Read full topic
